text: Tathagata Roy (born 14 September 1945) is an Indian politician. He was the Governor of Meghalaya from January 2020 to August 2020. He also was Governor of Tripura from 2015 to 2018. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Meghalaya Category:Governors of Tripura
title: Tathagata Roy
